## 2 tools

### For expert users

A code base (R package; Python and others to come) for the “translation” of verbal autopsy data from one standard to another.

### For all users 

An interactive web application for the translation of datasets from one standard to another (currently in Shiny/R; will port to Flask/Python depending on needs).
